alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Cullman; DeKalb; Franklin; Jackson; Lauderdale; Lawrence; Limestone; Madison; Marshall; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 25 at 5:36AM CST until January 30 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: .Widespread rain and some thunderstorms are expected across the Tennessee Valley today, but should end from northwest-to-southeast late this afternoon and this evening. With an additional 1-2 inches of rain expected to occur (along with locally higher amounts in thunderstorms), the risk for flash, areal, and river/creek flooding will remain high through this evening. ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Alabama, including the following areas, Colbert, Cullman, DeKalb, Franklin AL, Jackson, Lauderdale, Lawrence, Limestone, Madison, Marshall and Morgan and southern middle Tennessee, including the following areas, Franklin TN, Lincoln and Moore. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall amounts between 1-2 inches are expected across the region today and this evening, along with locally higher totals. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Colbert; Cullman; DeKalb; Franklin; Jackson; Lauderdale; Lawrence; Limestone; Madison; Marshall; Morgan
